Articles.Content: what can you expect, when Jeb is the pilot?

Checking the tracks work with Mechjeb's rover autopilot:

Seems to work fine.

Let me know if there are any other rover-related mods you want me to test with.
Please give us the tracks! They look AMAZING!
I can assure you all that we are in the final phases before the first pack is released, at this moment I am modelling the new sets.

Can you test them with bobcat seat and damned robotics ?

Looks so Nice,great effort!
Well, i do hope there will be a (very) long version available when you release the treads.

Well, i do hope there will be a (very) long version available when you release the treads.

In the current plan there wont be any (very) long sets, but there will be some longer than those shown in recent images/videos, some designed for small rovers, some for larger machines and more.

In the current plan there wont be any (very) long sets, but there will be some longer than those shown in recent images/videos, some designed for small rovers, some for larger machines and more.

I don't know what you call a long set but I call the "proof of concept" already a long set. If that's included i will be very happy indeed.

I usually don't work with the "standard" set of carts or vehicles. I tend to use vehicles which i design myself (ten to twelve meters long). Unfortunately i don't have an image available at this moment.

The carrying capacity of the "proof of concept" (240 KMU) is more than twice as much as i need.

I don't know what you call a long set but I call the "proof of concept" already a long set. If that's included i will be very happy indeed.

I usually don't work with the "standard" set of carts or vehicles. I tend to use vehicles which i design myself (ten to twelve meters long). Unfortunately i don't have an image available at this moment.

The carrying capacity of the "proof of concept" (240 KMU) is more than twice as much as i need.

If thats what you mean by a long set, then yes, I will be making a set based on the scale of the proof-of-concept piece. There will be more tracks after the initial release pack too, I just want to see the reactions and possible bugs that may ensue before making more.
Perfect! A set longer than that probably will become more and more unrealistic (and cause more and more problems).
A picture of one of the vehicles on mun and minmus.
I've been keeping an eye on this ever since your original experiments so many months ago. I'm very excited for the release!

Can you test them with bobcat seat and damned robotics ?

Sure, although I'm mainly interested in testing mods that manipulate rover wheels/controls directly rather than independent parts as there shouldn't be any problem with those.

A picture of one of the vehicles on mun and minmus.

I don't recognise the wheels, but assuming they're similar in size to Touhou's then here's a size comparison to the prototype:

The wheels ARE from TouHou (version 0.3)

Now i'm really drooling (seeing those two next to each other)!!
A small update.

MUST NEED!!!!!

*thinks about all the tanks he could make from this mod*
Going to try a few warhammer ideas with those

Behold, the first set of tracks are texturi-fied!

Bob seems indifferent about the blatant awesome behind him.
Thats one sexy set of threads

Thats one sexy set of threads

Major understatement buddy.
Glad you like them, Ill be making a couple more sets this week and hopefully release the first pack soon.
Take your time:) This is a longfully wanted and its so great you guys could make it=) cheers
Heres another teaser, using the B9 pack with the tracks (because I love the B9 pack, its fantastic), because I am a nice guy.
Well, other then the fact that the b9 tank turns way to fast for its size. SWEET!
We are still balancing the tracks a bit. The turning is a little tricky to get just right.
